Comment: Dunno precisely but she was kidnapped in Mass, driven to Vermont, and flown to Louisiana.
Author: Qubeye

Comment: Because she was in custody in VT when the habeas corpus petition was filed.
Author: VoteQuimby24

Comment: She was abducted in Somerville Massachusetts.  She was moved quickly to New Hampshire and also Vermont, I forget in which order.  But as she knew she was at risk of being arrested (for a fucking op-ed in a school newspaper nobody reads), her lawyer filed a writ of habeas corpus within hours. At the time of filing, she was in Vermont which is why this was heard there.  Shortly thereafter, she was flown to Lousiana. The administration was hoping to have the case heard there, as the judges are not nearly as immigration friendly.
Author: Apprentice57
